comment.body: Hey Kaffie, sorry to hear you are having such problems. Maybe doing sports right before the critical hours would help?
I was also away for a while and returned today. Coincidence? I think not! Also, how could I forget my dear zeronet?! ❤️‍
I fell out of love with the BitTorrent organization, so instead of BTSync I use Syncthing: https://syncthing.net/

That sounds horrible. I am trying to live as Google-free as possible, but I still have to get rid of my gmail account, even though my main email account is self-hosted. I have to make sure all important services have the new contact information before I remove my Google account.

Also, on my phone I am using LineageOS without any Google apps/services. I get all my apps from F-droid, plus the odd apk I download from elsewhere (this last step is not very secure, do it with caution if you do it at all).
